description:
When Kenshiro was a boy, Shu of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, gave up his own light in exchange for Kenshiro`s life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Hakuroken Shuu! Ten wa Akumade Hijou na Shukumei o Kasu!!
Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heaven Only Bestows Cruel Destinies!
南斗白鷺拳シュウ! 天はあくまで非情な宿命を課す!!
